name: Mix And Match: Best Bartender
description:
==== VOTED AS BEST DRINK GAME OF 2016 ====

You are a busy bartender! Don't loose any client.
Can you match all the gestures to make drinks?

Try lots of different combinations, rum, tequilla, vodka.
Remember all the drinks, cuba libre, dry martini, tequilla sunrise.

Some guests don't even know what they want!!
Don't get lost and do your best to MIX AND MATCH!
